Text:
No problem about the delay.

Thank you very much.

Does anyone know if the hour long episodes are supposed to count as two episodes in the numbering?

IMDB says no (lists Niagara as one episode and Mafia as #5): http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0386676/episodes

Wikipedia says yes (lists Niagra as two episodes, and Mafia as #6: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Office_%28U.S._TV_series%29_season_6

Which is supposed to be "correct"?

I finally found a page on NBC that lists episode numbers.

http://www.nbc.com/The_Office/video/categories/season-6/1157983/

Secret santa is listed as E13, so counting the hour long episodes as two is correct.
This upload has 30 seconds cut off the end.  AMiGOS doesn't do proper, full rips.  Downloader beware.
